message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe it's a bit higher than its worth to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand your perspective, $10,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is still a good deal for you, as the product is worth $15,000 to you. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11,500. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
